title: Com Chay Thanh Tinh
description: Little market stall with plastic chairs just outside the main market. Look for the word "chay" (vegetarian) on the front of the stall. Specializes in mock meat, sprouts, Asian basil, greens, varieties of noodle. Vegan except for the yellow noodle which contain egg. Try the traditional pho (rice noodle). Also has a small selection of grocery for sale. There is another Com Chay Thanh Tinh located at 30 Do Chieu, P.1, TP, Vung Tau, phone 869348.
